trans-unit.source: Provides a means of creating and formatting a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document file, complete with appropriate namespaces, elements, and attributes, for describing an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 만들고는 올바른 설명 언어 WSDL (웹 서비스) 문서 파일을 적절 한 네임 스페이스, 요소 및 특성을 갖춘 XML 웹 서비스를 설명 하기 위해 형식 지정 방법을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class can be created with either the `new` keyword or the static <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A> method, which parses a WSDL file and assigns its values to appropriate members of the class.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 인스턴스를 사용 하 여 만들 수는 `new` 키워드 또는 정적 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A>메서드를 WSDL 파일의 구문 분석 하 고 클래스의 적절 한 멤버에 해당 값을 할당 합니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: WSDL is an XML-based language for describing XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: WSDL은 XML 웹 서비스를 설명 하는 XML 기반 언어입니다.

trans-unit.source: The ServiceDescription class corresponds to the root element, `definitions`, of a WSDL file.
trans-unit.target: 루트 요소에 해당 하는 ServiceDescription 클래스 `definitions`, WSDL 파일의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: WSDL에 대 한 자세한 내용은 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/에 사양을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"> </xref> 에 포함 된 요소는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `binding` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection>이 속성에서 반환 목록에 속성은 해당 `binding` 으로 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 ()를 포함 하는 요소 `definitions` 루트 요소입니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: WSDL에 대 한 자세한 내용은 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/에 사양을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A collection of binding elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩 요소는 서비스 설명에 포함 된 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> represents a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file that can be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>구문 분석할 수 있는 올바른 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 파일을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>
trans-unit.target: 는<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader></xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> can recognize the node on which the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>에 노드를 인식할 수는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>위치 지정 되지 않았으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of extensibility elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 포함 된 확장 요소의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection of extensibility elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 포함 된 확장성 요소는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Import"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Import"> </xref> 에 포함 된 요소는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `import` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection>이 속성에서 반환 목록에 속성은 해당 `import` 으로 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 ()를 포함 하는 요소 `definitions` 루트 요소입니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: WSDL에 대 한 자세한 내용은 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/에 사양을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A collection of import elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 설명에 포함 된 가져오기 요소 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"> </xref> 에 포함 된 요소는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `message` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection>이 속성에서 반환 목록에 속성은 해당 `message` 으로 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 ()를 포함 하는 요소 `definitions` 루트 요소입니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: WSDL에 대 한 자세한 내용은 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/에 사양을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A collection of message elements contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 설명에 포함 된 메시지 요소의 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace in which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class is defined ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/").
trans-unit.target: XML 네임 스페이스는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 클래스 정의 ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/")는입니다.

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 이 필드는 상수입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"> </xref> 에 포함 된 요소는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `portType` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class by directly loading the XML from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 직접에서 XML을 로드 하 여 클래스는 <xref:System.IO.Stream>인스턴스.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>, passed by reference, which contains the bytes to be read.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>, 바이트를 읽을 수를 포함 하는 참조로 전달 합니다.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the XML Web service to which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> instance applies.
trans-unit.target: XML 웹 서비스의 URL을 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 인스턴스가 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML 웹 서비스의 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 문자열 ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 연결 된 스키마를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The schema associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 연결 된 스키마 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: Serialize 및 deserialize 간의 하는 데 사용 된 XML serializer를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 개체와 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 문서.

trans-unit.source: The XML serializer can be customized using classes derived from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> class.
trans-unit.target: 추상 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension>클래스</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> 에서 파생 된 클래스를 사용 하 여 사용자 XML serializer는 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: These classes are specified in a configuration file using the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` element and its child `add` element.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 클래스는 사용 하 여 구성 파일에 지정 된 된 `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` 요소와 해당 자식 `add` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The configuration can be applied to an ASP.NET Web application that publishes a Web service.
trans-unit.target: 웹 서비스를 게시 하는 ASP.NET 웹 응용 프로그램을 구성을 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: Serialize 및 deserialize 간의 하는 데 사용 된 XML serializer는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 개체와 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 문서.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> instance of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"> </xref> 인스턴스에 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 구성원임을 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection of service description.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 설명의 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> has not been assigned to a parent collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 부모 컬렉션에 할당 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref> instances contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"> </xref> 포함 된 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `service` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection>이 속성에서 반환 목록에 속성은 해당 `service` 으로 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 ()를 포함 하는 요소 `definitions` 루트 요소입니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: WSDL에 대 한 자세한 내용은 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/에 사양을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A collection of service instances contained in the service description.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 설명에 포함 된 서비스 인스턴스의 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_descriptions" name="descriptions" href=""></xref> tag enclosing a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
trans-unit.target: XML을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""> </xref> 특성에는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_descriptions" name="descriptions" href=""> </xref> WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 파일을 묶는 태그를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service described by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 설명 하는 XML 웹 서비스의 URL은 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"></xref> contained by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"> </xref> 에 포함 된는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> instance returned by this property corresponds to the list of `types` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types>이 속성에서 반환 하는 인스턴스 목록에 해당 `types` 으로 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 ()를 포함 하는 요소 `definitions` 루트 요소입니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: WSDL에 대 한 자세한 내용은 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/에 사양을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"></xref> instance that represents the data types of both the parameters and return values of the methods exposed by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"> </xref> 모두 매개 변수의 데이터 형식 및 XML 웹 서비스에서 노출 하는 메서드의 반환 값을 나타내는 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.TextReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, or <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with the validate parameter set to .
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 호출 하는 동안 생성 된 유효성 검사 경고가 들어 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.TextReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, 또는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29> 와 validate 매개 변수 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.TextReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, or <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with the validate parameter set to .
trans-unit.target: A 호출 하는 동안 생성 된 유효성 검사 경고가 들어 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.IO.TextReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>, 또는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Boolean%29> 와 validate 매개 변수 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 작성 된 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> 지정

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>, passed by reference, which contains the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file produced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>, 생성 된 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 파일을 포함 하는 참조로 전달 합니다.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file to the <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 작성 된 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter> WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 파일로

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> that contains the WSDL file produced.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>생성 되는 WSDL 파일을 포함 하는.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file to the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 작성은 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 파일로 지정된 된 경로에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The path to which the WSDL file is written.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 파일을 쓸 경로입니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes out the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
trans-unit.target: 작성은 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> 에 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 파일로.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>, passed by reference, which contains the WSDL file produced.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>, 생성 되는 WSDL 파일을 포함 하는 참조로 전달 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>
